paragraphs: You've been lied to. Not by anyone malicious — but by a system that profits from your confusion.

But here's the uncomfortable truth: hard work without strategy is just... hard.
Most people drift. They react. They guess. They hope things work out.
Meanwhile, a small percentage of people — the ones building generational wealth, launching multiple businesses, and living with total freedom — all have one thing in common:
